species.name: Human
species.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans excel in all professions through determination and ingenuity.

species.name: Elf
species.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves possess keen senses and natural affinity for magic and archery.

species.name: Dwarf
species.description: Sturdy and resilient, dwarves are master craftsmen with unmatched endurance and resistance to magic.

species.name: Gnome
species.description: Clever and inventive, gnomes combine arcane knowledge with mechanical genius and insatiable curiosity.

species.name: Dragonborn
species.description: Proud dragon-descended warriors who breathe elemental energy and possess formidable natural armor.

species.name: Githzerai
species.description: Ascetic psychic warriors from the astral plane, masters of mental discipline and martial prowess.

species.name: Orc
species.description: Fierce and powerful, orcs channel rage into devastating strength and intimidating presence.

species.name: Halfling
species.description: Nimble and lucky, halflings rely on stealth, resourcefulness, and remarkable fortune to survive.

species.name: Demonspawn
species.description: Born of infernal heritage, demonspawn wield dark powers and resist fire while struggling with their nature.

species.name: Centaur
species.description: Swift horse-bodied warriors who combine mobility with archery skills and natural survivalism.

species.name: Goblin
species.description: Small and scrappy, goblins compensate for size with cunning, agility, and explosive inventions.

species.name: Changeling
species.description: Mysterious shapeshifters who can assume any humanoid form, masters of deception and infiltration.
